segments.text: I need to get a costume for a fancy dress party , and I reply don't know what to get . Will you come shopping with me ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure I like shopping . Who is organizing the party ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: One of the girls in my office .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: There is no specie occasion . She just likes to organize parties from time to time . This time it is a country theme .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That's easy , how about a cowgirl ? Oh I know even better , a Canadian Mountie .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Well where am I going to get that sort of costume ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Leave it to me . I know exactly where to find it .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Excellent , come over at ten o'clock and we will start at the shopping center , the one around the corner from my house . They have just the shop we need .
segments.speaker: S2
